name: Acid Exposure
text:
Cost: 2 AP, 1 mana.
You spray acid at an enemy character within range. Roll a die and temporarily reduce that character's natural armor by the die roll. One of your allies near that enemy character may immediately perform a Normal Attack against it.
An enemy's armor may only be reduced by 1 acid exposure at a time.

Increase the size of your mana pool by 2.
